modules.name: steamdeck-galgame
build-commands:
cat > ${FLATPAK_DEST}/share/applications/io.github.steamdeck_galgame.desktop << 'EOF'
[Desktop Entry]
Version=1.0
Type=Application
Name=SteamDeck GAL Game Helper
Comment=Configure Chinese environment for SteamDeck games
Exec=steamdeck-galgame %U
Icon=io.github.steamdeck_galgame
Categories=Utility;Game;
Terminal=false
EOF

cat > ${FLATPAK_DEST}/share/metainfo/io.github.steamdeck_galgame.metainfo.xml << 'EOF' io.github.steamdeck_galgame SteamDeck GAL Game Helper Configure Chinese environment for SteamDeck games CC0-1.0 MIT

A utility tool to configure Chinese language environment for SteamDeck games.

Features:

  • Install Chinese locale support
  • Install Chinese fonts
  • Configure game launch options
 https://github.com/steamdeck-galgame/steamdeck-galgame https://github.com/steamdeck-galgame/steamdeck-galgame/issues

Initial release with full module architecture

 EOF
